short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Communicate with everyone on Flirtic TM website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension for the Flirtic TM website, allowing you to message anyone. 

FlirticTM is a website that restricts people messaging "popular users", and if you don't have premium subscription, you cannot talk to them. With this extension, you can. Just go to any persons profile page, and you will see the box from where you can send some message to them.

Beta: you can view who read your message on the threads board.

*Note: all the pictures on this page are from the public profiles found on Flirtic TM website.
